comment._content: If anyone has any additonal information on this plane please contact me. My grandfather flew in this plane. I have his album and the same picture. I am looking his bombing group insignia or logo. In box me crookchaser@gmail.com. I have more photos of different missins that he was on. One of the 34 that he flew. Munich, Benz factory etc...
